description: This is the main entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the root component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component that activates additional checks and warnings for its children.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
